benchmark_details.name: STSBench
benchmark_details.overview: STSBench is a scenario-based framework to benchmark the holistic understanding of vision-language models (VLMs) for autonomous driving. It evaluates spatio-temporal reasoning capabilities of VLMs through generated multiple-choice questions from pre-defined traffic scenarios using datasets such as NuScenes.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the spatio-temporal reasoning capabilities of vision-language models in the context of autonomous driving.

data.source: The NuScenes dataset; pre-defined scenarios are mined and human-verified for validity.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated as the proportion of correctly answered multiple-choice questions, reported as a weighted mean across all scenarios.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better model performance in spatio-temporal reasoning under various driving scenarios.
methodology.baseline_results: Various models including LLMs and VLMs evaluated by accuracy on specific scenarios.
methodology.validation: Scenarios mined from the dataset undergo human verification to ensure accuracy.
